name: Asian Chicken Stir-fry Wraps

ingredients.name: thinly sliced chicken, beef, pork, tofu, or shrimp

preparation: Reheat Stir-Fry in frying pan over medium heat for 3–5 minutes.
Divide mixture between tortillas. Top with cabbage, roll and serve.
tips: Serve with a veggie platter and prepared Epicure's Dip.
Using whole-wheat wraps is a great way to increase fibre – important for heart health and weight maintenance.

products.name: Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning
summary: Your go-to for stir-fries, sautéed vegetables or add as a seasoning to any rice and noodle dish.
